author: Gael Hernandez Palmer
title: Racket Cannot Save Files
question:
Hello,
I am working through all the EdX Edge items, and I wanted to save some of the racket files I am working on to my laptop. 
Every time I attempt to do this, I get this message:
"The save file operation failed to connect to the open and save panel service."
I am running MacOS Monterrey Version 12.0.1. And after googling, this seems to be a common problem. Do any course staff have suggestions on how to fix this?
Thanks!
